name: Coin Collection
description:
Coin Collection is a simple minigame that is made for gamepads in UE4.

How to Play

After choosing a character (currently they are all the same) the player will have a set amount of time to collect as many coins as possible. Play multiple times to find the best route!

Controls

The game is made primarily for gamepad input, KBM may work in some sections and may not function at all in other places.

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Music from Bensound.com
